title: UnappliedChanges
description: The UnappliedChanges stored as unappliedChanges.json holds information about changes that have not yet been applied to the data model. This includes M queries and associated metadata. This file is optional.

IncludeFutureArtifacts.title: IncludeFutureArtifacts
IncludeFutureArtifacts.description: A boolean indicating if new tables are loaded on table refresh.

ModelObjectUrnToSerializedRemovedChildre.title: ModelObjectUrnToSerializedRemovedChildren
ModelObjectUrnToSerializedRemovedChildre.description: A list of tables excluded from the dataset.

PerspectiveName.title: PerspectiveName
PerspectiveName.description: The name of the perspective you are connected to.

SerializedModelObjectNameDisambiguationP.title: SerializedModelObjectNameDisambiguationPreferences
SerializedModelObjectNameDisambiguationP.description: Controls how duplicate names are resolved.

name.title: Name
name.description: The datatype of the results from the M expression.

id.title: Id
id.description: The datatype of the results from the M expression.

description.title: Description
description.description: The datatype of the results from the M expression.

parentId.title: ParentId
parentId.description: The id of the parent group.

isUngroupedQueriesVirtualGroup.title: IsUngroupedQueriesVirtualGroup
isUngroupedQueriesVirtualGroup.description: A boolean indicating if this is the Other Queries group.

lineageTag.title: ModelLineageTag
lineageTag.description: A GUID representing the Lineage Tag. The Lineage tag maps this query to the data model.

refreshWhenRefreshingAll.title: RefreshWhenRefreshingAll
refreshWhenRefreshingAll.description: A boolean indicating if it should refresh this query when refreshing all the queries.

text.title: Text
text.description: The M query to be applied.

isDirectQuery.title: IsDirectQuery
isDirectQuery.description: A boolean indicating if this is a Direct Query Connection.

lastLoadedAsTableFormulaText.title: LastLoadedAsTableFormulaText
lastLoadedAsTableFormulaText.description: A boolean indicating if it was last loaded as TableFormulaText.

loadedAsTable.title: LoadedAsTable
loadedAsTable.description: A boolean indicating if it was loaded as a table.

loadAsTableDisabled.title: LoadAsTableDisabled
loadAsTableDisabled.description: A boolean indicating if the query should be loaded as a table.

resultType.title: ResultType
resultType.description: The datatype of the results from the M expression.

isHidden.title: IsHidden
isHidden.description: A boolean indicating if the query is hidden from the query editor. It is recommended to leave this property as is.

version.title: Version
version.description: Version of the local settings the file format.

conceptualSchemaSettings.title: ConceptualSchemaSettings
conceptualSchemaSettings.description: This holds settings related to Direct Query.

queries.title: Queries
queries.description: A list of the queries that have not yet been applied.

firewallEnabled.title: FirewallEnabled
firewallEnabled.description: A boolean indicating if we seperate queries for privacy.
